RegulatoryCode.name: RegulatoryCode
RegulatoryCode.description: Represents the regulation code enforced by the regulatory body.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date from which the code is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: Date till which the code is effective.

ExternalUrl.description: The URL of an external reference for the regulatory code.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the code is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RegulatoryAuthorityId.description: ID of the authority that governs the code.
